item.title: Topics for the workshop on Friday, Nov 10 include hardware (lickometers), Bonsai, video analysis, Open Ephys, UCLA Miniscope, Touchscreen Cognition, a discussion on tool integration, and time to meet with developers about the various projects represented at the workshop.

item.title: The deadline to cancel registration free of charge for #CCN2023 will be **this Friday July 14** so that people accepted off the waitlist will have enough time to plan their travel. Exceptions will be made for last-minute cancellations due to visa issues.
